name: Battle Maze Journey
description:
Welcome one and all to the premiere game from Lark and Rogue Media. I am MAEJ and this is Battle Maze Journey.

Waking up in a dark labyrinth our protagonist is armed with a measly heavy piece of wood and an old pistol. Using these you must guide them through a dark labyrinth filled with monsters, and chests filled with equipment and items for you to use. You will traverse 15 floors trying to find a way out and best your time. Explode walls, pick up stronger and better gear, slay monsters that guard your way out, and, most of all, be quick about it!

The game is currently an alpha build and the first release of our group. The current missing, but being worked on components are

  • A settings menu
  • Additional monsters and bosses
  • Additional weapons
  • Animations for battle
  • Audio
  • Better visuals

If you feel like donating any amount that would be greatly appreciated. Have fun and enjoy the game.
